item.question:
moderation
[ˌmɑːdəˈreɪʃn]
item.answer:
【考法】 n. 自制，节制：an avoidance of extremes in one's actions, beliefs, or habits
【例】 I’m not the kind of person who does everything in moderation. 我不是那种事事都能克制自己的人。
【近】restraint, self-control, self-discipline, temperance
【反】 debauchery, hedonism, indulgence, libertinism, license, profligacy, voluptuousness 放纵，放荡
